20101218020100.750|20101218020112.000|CCO|BRAD PITT AND OTHERS, ALL NEXT 
20101218020112.000|20101218020113.667|CCO|ON "LARRY KING LIVE."
20101218020113.667|20101218020115.333|CCO|WE'RE IN AL PACINO'S BACKYARD IN

20101218020118.667|20101218020120.333|CCO|MUCH BEGGING AND CAJOLING WAS

20101218020124.857|20101218020126.286|CCO|THIS IS THE SECOND TIME.

20101218020137.714|20101218020139.143|CCO|>> Larry: WATCH.
20101218020139.143|20101218020140.571|CCO|WHY HAVE YOU FINALLY COME?
20101218020140.571|20101218020142.000|CCO|>> I'VE COME HERE?
20101218020142.000|20101218020144.000|CCO|>> Larry: YES, FINALLY, AFTER 
20101218020144.000|20101218020146.000|CCO|YEARS OF ASKING.
20101218020146.000|20101218020148.000|CCO|>>Y IS NIHILITY, I GUESS.
20101218020148.000|20101218020150.000|CCO|>> WHY DO YOU DISLIKE 
20101218020150.000|20101218020152.000|CCO|INTERVIEWS?
20101218020152.000|20101218020154.500|CCO|>> WELL, I DON'T -- I THINK IT'S
20101218020154.500|20101218020157.000|CCO|BECAUSE IT STARTS WITH THE WHOLE
20101218020157.000|20101218020159.500|CCO|IDEA OF BEING AN ACTOR, WHICH IS
20101218020159.500|20101218020202.000|CCO|SOMETHING THAT IS A KIND OF -- 
20101218020202.000|20101218020203.429|CCO|THE ANONYMITY OF AN ACTOR.

20101218020230.571|20101218020232.000|CCO|TWO KINDS OF ACTORS.

20101218020234.000|20101218020236.000|CCO|SHY TYPE.

20101218020238.000|20101218020240.000|CCO|REASON THAT THEY ARE ABLE TO

20101218020522.000|20101218020523.429|CCO|>> Larry: BY THE WAY, THE 
20101218020523.429|20101218020524.857|CCO|ADVANCE FOR MERCHANTS OF ADVANCE

20101218020526.286|20101218020527.714|CCO|$4 MILLION.
20101218020527.714|20101218020529.143|CCO|AS OF WEEKS AGO BEFORE YOU 
20101218020529.143|20101218020530.571|CCO|OPENED.
20101218020530.571|20101218020532.000|CCO|SO YOU SHOULD BE VERY PROUD.
20101218020532.000|20101218020534.500|CCO|THE REVIEWS WERE AMAZING.
20101218020534.500|20101218020537.000|CCO|I WANT TO TOUCH A LOT OF BASES.
20101218020537.000|20101218020539.500|CCO|YOU PLAY SHYLOCK.
20101218020539.500|20101218020542.000|CCO|IN THE TIME OF SHAKESPEARE, WAS 
20101218020542.000|20101218020543.111|CCO|HE ANTI-SEMITIC IN YOUR OPINION?
20101218020543.111|20101218020544.222|CCO|>> IN MY OPINION, NO, HE WASN'T.
20101218020544.222|20101218020545.333|CCO|BUT IT'S HARD TO TELL WHAT WAS 
20101218020545.333|20101218020546.444|CCO|GOING ON BACK THEN.
20101218020546.444|20101218020547.556|CCO|THAT'S 400 YEARS AGO WHAT WAS 
20101218020547.556|20101218020548.667|CCO|BEING INTERPRETED.
20101218020548.667|20101218020549.778|CCO|THERE'S A LOT OF INTERPRETATIONS
20101218020549.778|20101218020550.889|CCO|OF THE PLAY.

20101218020552.000|20101218020554.500|CCO|ANTI-SEMITISM IN THE PLAY, OF 
20101218020554.500|20101218020557.000|CCO|COURSE.
20101218020557.000|20101218020559.500|CCO|BUT I ALSO THINK SHYLOCK IS -- 
20101218020559.500|20101218020602.000|CCO|IT'S ALSO A BLATANT CRY AGAINST 
20101218020602.000|20101218020604.000|CCO|PREJUDICE IN SOME WAYS WHEN YOU 
20101218020604.000|20101218020606.000|CCO|THINK OF WHAT THEY DO TO THIS 
20101218020606.000|20101218020608.000|CCO|PERSON BECAUSE HE'S A JEW.

20101218020613.667|20101218020615.333|CCO|>> SO BEFORE YOU PLAY HIM, DO 
20101218020615.333|20101218020617.000|CCO|YOU THINK ABOUT IT A LOT?

20101218020622.000|20101218020624.000|CCO|>> WELL, YEAH.
20101218020624.000|20101218020626.000|CCO|I MEAN YOU KNOW, YOU DON'T -- 
20101218020626.000|20101218020628.000|CCO|FIRST OF ALL YOU THINK OF 
20101218020628.000|20101218020630.000|CCO|ANYBODY YOU ARE PLAYING AS A

20101218020637.000|20101218020638.667|CCO|HE'S DOING.

20101218020640.333|20101218020642.000|CCO|ON.

20101218020644.000|20101218020646.000|CCO|ARE -- AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED, 
20101218020646.000|20101218020648.000|CCO|I AM LOOKING AT THE PLAY THROUGH
20101218020648.000|20101218020650.000|CCO|SHYLOCK'S POINT OF VIEW.
20101218020650.000|20101218020652.000|CCO|AND HE'S DEFIANT.

20101218020653.111|20101218020654.222|CCO|PREJUDICE.
20101218020654.222|20101218020655.333|CCO|HE DEFIES IT.
20101218020655.333|20101218020656.444|CCO|THAT'S WHAT I LOVE ABOUT THE 
20101218020656.444|20101218020657.556|CCO|CHARACTER.
20101218020657.556|20101218020658.667|CCO|>> Larry: YOU LIKE PLAYING 
20101218020658.667|20101218020659.778|CCO|SHAKESPEARE?
20101218020659.778|20101218020700.889|CCO|>> I LOVE PLAYING SHAKESPEARE, 
20101218020700.889|20101218020702.000|CCO|YEAH.
20101218020702.000|20101218020703.667|CCO|YEAH, I DO.
20101218020703.667|20101218020705.333|CCO|>> Larry: AND I JUST SAW SOLOME.
20101218020705.333|20101218020707.000|CCO|WHEN IS THAT GOING TO COME OUT?
20101218020707.000|20101218020708.667|CCO|YOU DIRECTED IT.
20101218020708.667|20101218020710.333|CCO|YOU STAR IN IT.
20101218020710.333|20101218020712.000|CCO|>> ONE NEVER KNOWS.
20101218020712.000|20101218020713.429|CCO|YOU KNOW, THIS HAS BEEN AN 
20101218020713.429|20101218020714.857|CCO|ONGOING THING FOR ME FOR FOUR 
20101218020714.857|20101218020716.286|CCO|YEARS.
